sentence.text: This progressive muscle pathology resembles the muscular dystrophy phenotype in humans and mice lacking the α7 integrin.
Furthermore, Ptrh2 expression is altered in skeletal muscle of classical congenital muscular dystrophy mouse models.
Ptrh2 levels were up-regulated in dystrophin deficient mdx muscle, which correlates with the elevated levels of the α7β1 integrin observed in mdx muscle and Duchenne muscular dystrophy patients.
